job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.industry: Computer Software,Consumer Services,Information Technology and Services
job.description: pstrongAbout the jobstrongppWe are a hypergrowth eCommerce startup with a mission to bring a smile to peoples faces by connecting them to products that bring nourishment love memories connection nostalgia and comfortnbspWeve recently closed our Series C funding for 110M and are looking to scale our AI amp Data practice ppbrppWe are looking for a top Machine Learning Engineer to join our team in New York You will be joining a small team of experienced ML engineers and have the opportunity to learn and have a significant impact on mission critical projects The team is building deep learning models for RecSystems Personalization and Search functionality ppbrppstrongCore ResponsibilitiesstrongpulliCollaborate with crossfunctional teams of data scientists data engineers software engineers and machine learning engineers liliResearch and implement bestinclass ML approaches to ecommerce problemsnbspliliDevelop a deep subject matter expertise of how our marketplace functions across the entire user journeyliliOwn and iterate upon our various recommendation  personalization and search enginesnbspliliOversee endtoend model lifecycle developmentliliDeploy ML models into productionliliDrive meaningful ROI and impact upon our full funnel acquisition and retentionliulpbrppstrongBasic QualificationsstrongpulliBS in a quantitative field ie Computer Science Engineering Physics Mathematics etc lili15 years of experience building production level Machine Learning models liliExcellent programming and debugging skills in PythonlilispanExperience with deep learning frameworks amp libraries ie PyTorch Tensorflow etc spanliliStrong ML background in at least one of the following areas NLP Search recommendation personalization rankingrelevance etc liulpbrppstrongNice to Have strongpulliAdvanced Degree in a quantitative field MS  PhD liliDirect ECommerce Experienceliul
